epic_title: Secure User Authentication and Multi-Factor Login
title: Develop Multi-Factor Authentication Mechanism
description: As a user, I want to authenticate with multiple factors, so that my account security is enhanced.
attributes_and_rules: Must support multiple authentication methods such as OTP, biometrics, and email-based verification.
acceptance_criteria: The system must prompt users for a second authentication factor after entering their password.
test_cases: Given a user has entered their password, When the system requests a second authentication factor, Then the user must provide the second factor to gain access.

epic_title: Secure User Authentication and Multi-Factor Login
title: Ensure Compliance with Security Best Practices
description: As a security officer, I want the authentication framework to follow best practices, so that it protects against unauthorized access.
attributes_and_rules: Must comply with relevant banking regulations and security best practices.
acceptance_criteria: The authentication framework follows all established security guidelines and passes audits.
test_cases: Given the established security guidelines, When the authentication framework is audited, Then it must pass the audit without issues.

title: Design a Responsive Interface
description: As a user, I want the portal to adapt to my device, so that I have a consistent experience.
attributes_and_rules: Interface must work seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
acceptance_criteria: The interface should respond to different screen sizes and orientations without losing functionality.
test_cases: Given a user accessing the portal from different devices, When the screen size changes, Then the interface must adjust to provide a consistent experience.

title: Ensure Accessibility Compliance
description: As a user with disabilities, I want to access the portal, so that I can use its features without obstacles.
attributes_and_rules: Must adhere to accessibility standards such as WCAG.
acceptance_criteria: All features must be accessible to users with disabilities, meeting WCAG standards.
test_cases: Given a user with disabilities accessing the portal, When using accessibility tools, Then all features should be fully operable.

title: Create Personalized Dashboard
description: As a user, I want a dashboard tailored to my profile, so that I see relevant financial products and services.
attributes_and_rules: Dashboard must dynamically present products and services based on user profile and activity history.
acceptance_criteria: The dashboard presents personalized content based on the user's profile and history.
test_cases: Given a logged-in user, When the dashboard loads, Then it should display services and products personalized to the user.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
title: Implement Online Account Opening Workflow
description: As a user, I want to open an account online, so that I do not have to visit the bank.
attributes_and_rules: Workflow must be simplified with prefilled data and guided navigation.
acceptance_criteria: Users are able to complete account openings online with minimal steps.
test_cases: Given a user wants to open an account online, When they follow the guided workflow, Then the account should be created upon successful completion.

title: Develop Save and Resume Feature
description: As a user, I want to save my application progress, so that I can resume it later without data loss.
attributes_and_rules: Save progress securely and allow retrieval upon authentication.
acceptance_criteria: Users can save partially completed applications and resume from the same point.
test_cases: Given a user partially completes an application, When they save and close it, Then they should be able to resume from where they left off after logging back in.

title: Enable Secure Document Upload
description: As a user, I want to upload documents securely, so that my sensitive information is protected.
attributes_and_rules: Documents must be encrypted during transfer and storage.
acceptance_criteria: Documents are securely uploaded and stored with encryption.
test_cases: Given a user uploads a document, When the upload completes, Then it should be encrypted and stored securely.

title: Implement Request Tracking System
description: As a user, I want to track my requests in real time, so that I stay informed about their status.
attributes_and_rules: Real-time visual indicators for request progress must be present.
acceptance_criteria: Users can see the real-time status of their requests with visual indicators.
test_cases: Given a user submits a request, When they check the request status, Then they should see real-time updates with progress indicators.

title: Set Up Email Notifications for Request Updates
description: As a user, I want email notifications for updates on my requests, so that I am promptly informed about changes.
attributes_and_rules: Automatic email notifications must be sent for each status change.
acceptance_criteria: Users receive email notifications whenever the status of their request changes.
test_cases: Given a request status changes, When the system processes the update, Then the user should receive an email notification about the change.
